attributes.action: TFL should suspend all paid parking charge To support essential and key workers
attributes.additional_details: Instruct TFL to suspend all paid parking in London area to promote safe and secure travel which will allow the drivers to be safe from infected or suspected of being infected. They should be able to travel in segregation and in full control of their health. Members of the public should be able to EFFECTIVELY use PHV or Hackney Carriage to have CAR service. Not be able to mix with extra no of people in buses and tube. Free parking will allow PHV drivers to park and wait for passengers.
attributes.background: Transport for London should suspend paid parking in the zone 1 and zone 2 for essential drivers and key workers. The life is coming to a stand still and private vehicles driven will prevent further spread of the virus in the capital. People will be able to stay safe and secure.

rejection.details: Transport for London is the responsibility of the Mayor of London, and not the UK Government or Parliament.
